title._content: North Fork Cañon, Sierra Blanca Creek, Arizona (LOC)

description._content: O'Sullivan, Timothy H., 1840-1882, photographer. North Fork Cañon, Sierra Blanca Creek, Arizona 1873. 1 photographic print : albumen. Notes: Plate no. 4. Title from item. Originally published: Photographs showing landscapes, geological, and other features of portions of the western territory of the United States, obtained in connection with geographical and geological explorations and surveys west of the 100th meridian, seasons of 1871, 1872, and 1873. [Washington, D.C.] : War Dept., Corps of Engineers, U.S. Army, [1875] Published in: Framing the West: The Survey Photographs of Timothy H. O'Sullivan / Toby Jurovics, Carol M. Johnson, Glenn Willumson, and William F. Stapp. New Haven: Yale University Press, 2010, plate 85. Subjects: Canyons--Arizona--1870-1880. Format: Expedition photographs--1870-1880. Landscape photographs--1870-1880. Albumen prints--1870-1880. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Persistent URL: hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.10047 Call Number: LOT 4677-C, no. 4
